T02D2660:311b-0: @311b ` // rdo rje chos kyi sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02D2660:312a-0: // / @312a # // 'phags pa rdo rje chos kyi ni /
T02D2660:312a-1: rnal 'byor gcig pa sgom pa'i thabs //
T02D2660:312a-2: kun dga' snying po'i rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D2660:312a-3: rang la phan phyir 'di brtsam mo //
T02D2660:312a-4: de la rnal 'byor pa gang zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa /
T02D2660:312a-5: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang thob pa /
T02D2660:312a-6: rig pa'i sdom pa yongs su bzung pa /
T02D2660:312a-10: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yid dang rjes su
T02D2660:312a-11: mthun pa'i gnas su bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas
T02D2660:312a-12: / dang por re zhig bdag med pa la lhag
T02D2660:312a-13: par mos pas nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus
T02D2660:312a-14: byas la lkog ma'i phyogs su yi ge hr'i: las
T02D2660:312a-15: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams pa'i lce'i padma'i 'dab
T02D2660:312a-16: mar h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po
T02D2660:312a-17: / bskyed la / badzra dzi hva zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2660:312a-18: lag pa gnyis su yang aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bsams la /
T02D2660:312a-19: de gnyis kyi steng du h'um gnyis las rdo rje
T02D2660:312a-20: rtse lnga pa gnyis bsam zhing lag pa'i sor mo
T02D2660:312a-21: rnams kyang rtse mor bsams la bgegs gzhom pa la
T02D2660:312a-22: sogs pa bya'o // de nas yi ge h'um las
T02D2660:312a-23: rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams te
T02D2660:312a-24: sogs pa bya'o // / khro bo ti r'inta ri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2660:312a-25: aom grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um bam /
T02D2660:312a-27: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'aka h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2660:312a-29: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings mthe bong gnyis
T02D2660:312a-30: gshibs te bsgreng bas sor mo'i steng nas dgab pa'i
T02D2660:312a-31: tshul du gzhag pa 'di ni ti r'inti ri'i phyag
T02D2660:312a-32: rgya ste / 'dis spyi bo nas brtsams nas phyogs
T02D2660:312a-33: bzhir rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blangs nas
T02D2660:312a-34: rgya ste / / aom tum zhes pa'i yi ge gnyis kyi go chas go bgos la /
T02D2660:312a-35: aom badzra dzv'a l'a na l'arka h'um /
T02D2660:312a-36: zhes brjod cing g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag
T02D2660:312a-37: nas g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bsor zhing bgegs
T02D2660:312a-38: thams cad la bsnun par bya'o //
T02D2660:312a-39: de nas rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs bsreg par bya ste /
T02D2660:312a-40: h'um badzra aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat /
T02D2660:312a-42: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas te /
T02D2660:312a-43: mthe bo rdo rjer 'greng ba 'di ni me'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2660:312a-44: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mkhrig
T02D2660:312b-0: ma gnyis bsnol te mthe'u chung gnyis @312b lcags kyur
T02D2660:312b-1: sprel la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
T02D2660:312b-2: ba'i mdzub mo gnyis sdig mdzub tu bsgreng ba ni
T02D2660:312b-3: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2660:312b-6: grihn'a ba ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D2660:312b-7: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'an bidy'a r'a dza h'um phat /
T02D2660:312b-8: ces bya ba'i sngags dang bcas pas rdo rje'i ra ba dang dra ba rnams bya'o //
T02D2660:312b-9: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2660:312b-10: aom badzra tsakra h'um zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ste /
T02D2660:312b-11: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02D2660:312b-12: mdzub mo mthe bong rdo rjer mdud //
T02D2660:312b-13: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes grags te //
T02D2660:312b-14: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin //
T02D2660:312b-15: 'dis phyogs thams cad du g-yas phyogs nas bskor bas dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul bar bya'o //
T02D2660:312b-16: 'di nyid khar bzhag la blta bzhin du rdo rje
T02D2660:312b-17: 'khor lo'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na dkyil
T02D2660:312b-18: 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2660:312b-19: de nas dkyil 'khor blos mngon sum lta bur dmigs
T02D2660:312b-20: la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod
T02D2660:312b-21: de / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya
T02D2660:312b-22: w'aka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha n'am ka
T02D2660:312b-23: de / ro m'i / de nas phyag bzhi bya
T02D2660:312b-24: ste 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo
T02D2660:312b-25: brkyang ba la lus thams cad phab ste /
T02D2660:312b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pa sth'a n'a ya a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2660:312b-27: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D2660:312b-29: de nas lho phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa
T02D2660:312b-30: las rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag ste dpral
T02D2660:312b-31: ba sa la reg par byas la /
T02D2660:312b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi
T02D2660:312b-33: she ka ya a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi
T02D2660:312b-34: badzra ra aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2660:312b-36: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje thal
T02D2660:312b-37: mo spyi bor bzhag ste kha sa la reg pa
T02D2660:312b-38: dang / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza
T02D2660:312b-39: pra warta n'a ya a'atma n'am niry'a ta y'a mi
T02D2660:312b-40: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharma pra warta ya
T02D2660:312b-41: dang / m'am / zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o //
T02D2660:312b-42: de nas byang phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa
T02D2660:312b-43: las rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab nas
T02D2660:312b-44: snying gar sbyar la spyi bo sa la reg par
T02D2660:312b-45: bya ste / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u
T02D2660:312b-46: dza karm'a ne a'atma n'am niry'a ta y'a mi sarba
T02D2660:312b-47: ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am /
T02D2660:312b-49: de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D2660:312b-50: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2660:313a-1: shus yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02D2660:313a-4: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /
T02D2660:313a-5: sdom pa la gnas pa'i bar du byas la /
T02D2660:313a-6: de nas lag pa g-yas pa'i gung mo la aom mdzub mo la h'um /
T02D2660:313a-8: mthe'u chung la hr'i: mthe bo la aa: bsam zhing /
T02D2660:313a-9: g-yon pa'i sor mo rnams la yang de bzhin du bkod de /
T02D2660:313a-10: g-yas par gnas pa'i sa bon rnams la ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skur bsam mo //
T02D2660:313a-11: g-yon pa la gnas pa'i sa bon rnams ni rdo
T02D2660:313a-12: rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i skur
T02D2660:313a-13: bsams nas phan tshun thabs dang shes rab dag bcas
T02D2660:313a-14: pa'i mngon par 'dod pas thal mo mdon [*mngon] du
T02D2660:313a-16: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga t'a: sarba dharma:/
T02D2660:313a-18: de nas sor mo rnams shin tu yang bcer te /
T02D2660:313a-19: lha de rnams lha mo de dag gi thugs kar zhugs par bsams la /
T02D2660:313a-20: aa tyanta aa nu bra besht'a: sarba dharma:/
T02D2660:313a-23: thal mo dam du bsdams pa las //
T02D2660:313a-24: sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni //
T02D2660:313a-25: rdo rje thal mo bka' stsal te //
T02D2660:313a-26: rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams //
T02D2660:313a-27: badzra aanydza li zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so //
T02D2660:313a-28: badzra bandha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste /
T02D2660:313a-29: badzra bandha trata ces brjod cing snying gar lan gsum dral bar bya'o //
T02D2660:313a-30: badzra a'a be sha zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas aa:/
T02D2660:313a-31: zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2660:313a-32: dbab pa de yang 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02D2660:313a-33: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba sh'a shva to
T02D2660:313a-34: me bha ba hra da yam me aa dhe tishtha
T02D2660:313a-35: sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha h'um /
T02D2660:313a-38: zhes bya bas dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2660:313a-41: aom sarba aa p'a ya a'a kad'a na bi sho dha na badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02D2660:313a-42: ces bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas ngan 'gro thams cad dgug par bya'o //
T02D2660:313a-43: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du //
T02D2660:313a-44: mdzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas su //
T02D2660:313a-45: legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni //
T02D2660:313a-46: ltung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o //
T02D2660:313a-47: aom badzra p'a ni bi spho ta ya bandha na ni pra mo ksha ya /
T02D2660:313a-48: sarba aa p'a ya ga ti bhya: sarba satv'a ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya tra ta /
T02D2660:313b-0: ces brjod cing sdig pa dral @313b ba'i phyag rgya bcings la sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02D2660:313b-1: rdo rje bcing ba bsdams byas te //
T02D2660:313b-2: gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas ni //
T02D2660:313b-3: tha ma bzhi yi rtse mor sbyar //
T02D2660:313b-4: sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin //
T02D2660:313b-5: de nas mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams badzra mu: zhes brjod nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2660:313b-6: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2660:313b-7: dbus su rang gi snying po badzra dharma zhes dam
T02D2660:313b-8: tshig gis bris la chos thams cad bdag med par
T02D2660:313b-9: bsgom par bya'o // de nyid dbyangs kyi yi ge
T02D2660:313b-10: bcu drug dang bcas pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2660:313b-11: rnam par yongs su gyur par bsams la /
T02D2660:313b-12: yang de'i steng du de nyid dang /
T02D2660:313b-13: yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa
T02D2660:313b-14: lta bu yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2660:313b-15: 'khor chen po'i gzugs can gnyis pa nyid du bsam
T02D2660:313b-16: mo // de las byung ba gang yin pa de
T02D2660:313b-17: la ni yang de'i tshe snying po dang bcas pa
T02D2660:313b-18: las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'ong zer gyi phreng
T02D2660:313b-19: ba dang bcas pa bsam mo //
T02D2660:313b-20: de nas de las byung ba ni rang gi phyag rgya padmo'o //
T02D2660:313b-21: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i dbus su rang gi
T02D2660:313b-22: phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya ste padmo&
T02D2660:313b-24: rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing de bzhin gshegs
T02D2660:313b-25: pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
T02D2660:313b-26: rje'i dbyings phyag rgya la zhugs par bsams la bsnyems
T02D2660:313b-27: pa dang bcas pas rdo rje bsor zhing badzra satva
T02D2660:313b-29: de nas rang gi sngags badzra dharma zhes brjod pas
T02D2660:313b-30: rang gi lha rdo rje chos sku mdog dmar skya
T02D2660:313b-31: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2660:313b-32: stod dang smad pa ti'i tshi gu mnabs pa /
T02D2660:313b-33: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis thugs kar padma'i
T02D2660:313b-34: sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g-yas pas kha 'byed pa'i
T02D2660:313b-36: sna tshogs padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D2660:313b-37: bzhugs par rang nyid bsams la 'di skad ces brjod
T02D2660:313b-38: par bya'o // ma h'a sa ma ya satv'a ham /
T02D2660:313b-39: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2660:313b-41: de nyid gyis snying ga dang /
T02D2660:313b-44: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2660:313b-45: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D2660:313b-46: de nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2660:313b-47: la rang gi snying po badzra dharma dang sngags aom
T02D2660:313b-48: badzra dharma hr'i:zhes bya ba yang bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2660:313b-49: de nas sa ma ya aa:zhes brjod de /
T02D2660:314a-0: @314a * // mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprul la badzra dharma aa /
T02D2660:314a-1: zhes bya ba 'dis de'i steng du padmar bdag nyid dbab par bya'o //
T02D2660:314a-4: zhes padma'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D2660:314a-5: padma de nyid badzra ne tro& ham /
T02D2660:314a-6: zhes zlos shing rdo rje chos su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2660:314a-7: de nas ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02D2660:314a-10: 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2660:314a-11: snying po de rnams kyis de nyid du dgug pa dang /
T02D2660:314a-15: badzra aam gu sha dza: badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02D2660:314a-18: de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni /
T02D2660:314a-19: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni //
T02D2660:314a-20: mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02D2660:314a-21: mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub //
T02D2660:314a-22: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyems te mnan //
T02D2660:314a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa las /
T02D2660:314a-24: mthe bo gnyis gshibs te mdzub mo gnyis bkug la padma lta bu dang /
T02D2660:314a-25: badzra dharma dri shya zhes bya ba 'dis blta bar bya'o //
T02D2660:314a-26: ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas //
T02D2660:314a-27: rang gi lus la rab tu bsgom //
T02D2660:314a-28: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02D2660:314a-30: zhes brjod pas rang gi lus la dgug pa dang /
T02D2660:314a-32: bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o //
T02D2660:314a-33: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas /
T02D2660:314a-34: rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni //
T02D2660:314a-35: sa ma ya stvam aa ham brjod /
T02D2660:314a-36: der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom //
T02D2660:314a-37: badzra dharma zhes bya ba'i snying po dang /
T02D2660:314a-38: aom badzra dharma hr'i: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02D2660:314a-39: de nas lce la rdo rje bsams la sarba k'a ri zhes chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya'o //
T02D2660:314a-40: de nas snying gar zla ba la rdo rje sna tshogs bsams la /
T02D2660:314a-41: las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2660:314a-42: rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gar byas nas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis /
T02D2660:314a-43: padma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g-yas pas padma kha
T02D2660:314a-44: 'byed pa'i tshul du mdzad pa ni las kyi phyag
T02D2660:314a-45: rgya'o ; / de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing
T02D2660:314a-46: ba ni rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje
T02D2660:314a-49: bzhugs tshul la sogs ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo //
T02D2660:314a-50: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba la ni sur ta stvam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2660:314b-0: de nas rang gi lus la rdo rje bsdu ba'i @314b phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2660:314b-3: yid kyis legs par sbyor ba yis //
T02D2660:314b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya //
T02D2660:314b-6: de rnams kyi rang gi dam tshig dang /
T02D2660:314b-8: phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2660:314b-9: rdo rje dbyings kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2660:314b-10: badzra dh'a tu dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2660:314b-11: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02D2660:314b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo ge shva ra h'um /
T02D2660:314b-16: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags lan gsum brjod par bya'o ;
T02D2660:314b-17: / de bzhin du mi bskyong [*bskyod?] pa dang /
T02D2660:314b-20: don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2660:314b-21: badzra dh'a tu dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2660:314b-22: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02D2660:314b-24: badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba spyi'i snying po lan gsum brjod par bya zhing /
T02D2660:314b-26: nyes bya ba mi bskyod pa'i snying po dang /
T02D2660:314b-28: zhes bya ba rin chen 'byung ldan gyi snying po dang /
T02D2660:314b-30: zhes bya ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po dang /
T02D2660:314b-32: zhes bya ba don yod grub pa'i snying po yang lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D2660:314b-33: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni /
T02D2660:314b-34: rdo rje bsdams pa ltar byas la /
T02D2660:314b-35: gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng //
T02D2660:314b-36: gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni //
T02D2660:314b-37: sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i yin par bshad //
T02D2660:314b-38: gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang //
T02D2660:314b-39: gung mo padmo 'dra bar dgug / sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D2660:314b-40: de bzhin mdzub gnyis bkug pa'o //
T02D2660:314b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba la ni /
T02D2660:314b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ljags la chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya ste /
T02D2660:314b-45: badzra dzny'a na zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2660:314b-46: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya yin no //
T02D2660:314b-47: snga ma bzhin du ljags la rdo rje bsams la sbyar ro //
T02D2660:314b-49: las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni //
T02D2660:314b-50: rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te //
T02D2660:314b-51: mnyam par bzhag pas gnyis su dbye //
T02D2660:314b-52: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02D2660:314b-53: de nas bcing bar rab tu bshad //
T02D2660:314b-54: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02D2660:315a-0: @315a * // g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D2660:315a-1: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
T02D2660:315a-2: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o /
T02D2660:315a-3: mi g-yo ba yi sa reg pa //
T02D2660:315a-4: rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D2660:315a-5: tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog / gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02D2660:315a-6: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni snying gar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms te /
T02D2660:315a-7: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni sku mdog
T02D2660:315a-8: dkar po seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil mo
T02D2660:315a-10: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa bsnams pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02D2660:315a-11: dar la'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs mnabs pa /
T02D2660:315a-12: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D2660:315a-13: dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhal bzhi pa /
T02D2660:315a-14: zhal dkar po shar phyogs su gzigs pa'o //
T02D2660:315a-15: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2660:315a-18: don yod grub pa yang sku mdog sngon po dang /
T02D2660:315a-22: gdan ni glang po che dang /
T02D2660:315a-25: nam mkha' lding la go rims bzhin du rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa /
T02D2660:315a-31: rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02D2660:315a-33: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas ni spyi gtsug yin no //
T02D2660:315a-34: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang
T02D2660:315a-35: ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa'i gnas ni
T02D2660:315a-36: snying ga dang / dpral ba dang /
T02D2660:315a-39: de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2660:315a-40: satva badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya bas snying gar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2660:315a-41: snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su de bsam par bya'o //
T02D2660:315a-42: rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2660:315a-43: ratna badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya bas
T02D2660:315a-44: rdo rje rin chen ma ni dbang bskur ba'i gnas
T02D2660:315a-45: su rdo rje rin po che'i rnam par ro //
T02D2660:315a-46: rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2660:315a-47: dharma badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya ba
T02D2660:315a-48: dang rdo rje chos ma ni lkog ma'i phyogs su
T02D2660:315a-49: rdo rje padma'i rnam par ro //
T02D2660:315a-50: rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2660:315a-51: karma badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D2660:315a-52: zhes bya bas rdo rje las ma ni spyi bor
T02D2660:315b-0: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang ldan par @315b
T02D2660:315b-1: bskyed par bya'o // de nas aom badzra dharma sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02D2660:315b-2: badzra dharma ya tve no pa tishtha /
T02D2660:315b-5: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2660:315b-6: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D2660:315b-9: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D2660:315b-12: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ma mme munytsa /
T02D2660:315b-13: badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa:
T02D2660:315b-14: zhes bya ba yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas
T02D2660:315b-16: de nas rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02D2660:315b-17: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de /
T02D2660:315b-18: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2660:315b-19: de nyid kyi gung mo gnyis kyis phreng ba blangs te /
T02D2660:315b-21: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya zhing /
T02D2660:315b-23: pra t'i tstsha badzra ho: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi spyi bor dor bar bya'o //
T02D2660:315b-25: aom pra ti grihna tvam mi mam satva ma h'a ba la /
T02D2660:315b-26: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2660:315b-27: de nas aom satva sva yan te tsakshu gha ta na /
T02D2660:315b-28: ta da pa ru ta gha ta ya ti sarba ksho /
T02D2660:315b-31: zhes bya ba 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2660:315b-32: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
T02D2660:315b-33: yang rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2660:315b-35: zhes zlos shir snying gar dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2660:315b-36: de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
T02D2660:315b-38: zhes bya ba 'dis chu'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2660:315b-39: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang /
T02D2660:315b-40: dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pas blang bar bya'o //
T02D2660:315b-41: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2660:315b-42: spyi gtsug tu aom las rnam par snang mdzad bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2660:315b-43: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shra ri h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2660:315b-44: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2660:315b-45: yi ge h'um las dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D2660:315b-46: aom badzra badzri ni aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2660:315b-47: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2660:315b-48: yi ge tr'am las rnab g-yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D2660:315b-49: aom ratna badzri ni aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2660:315b-50: 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2660:316a-0: yi ge hr'i: las rgyab tu ni 'od dpag tu @316a * //
T02D2660:316a-2: / aom dharma badzre ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2660:316a-3: don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la yi ge
T02D2660:316a-4: aa las don yod par grub par bskyed la 'di
T02D2660:316a-6: aom karma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02D2660:316a-7: rdo rje thal mo rab bcings la //
T02D2660:316a-8: mthe bod gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02D2660:316a-9: mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug nas ni //
T02D2660:316a-10: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02D2660:316a-11: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02D2660:316a-12: de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya //
T02D2660:316a-13: gung mo gnyis ni rin chen 'dra //
T02D2660:316a-14: padmor srin lag mthe'u chung gung //
T02D2660:316a-15: lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang //
T02D2660:316a-17: de'i rjes la aom tum zhes bya ba dang ;
T02D2660:316a-18: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snying gar mdud pa
T02D2660:316a-19: bcing ba'i tshul gyis go bgo bar bya zhing de
T02D2660:316a-26: dpral ba'i steng du bzhag / dar dbyangs bcings pa'i
T02D2660:316a-27: tshul du byas te sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha'
T02D2660:316a-28: ma la sogs pa nas bkrol te /
T02D2660:316a-30: zhes bya bas mnyes par byas te /
T02D2660:316a-32: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D2660:316a-33: di ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D2660:316a-34: sangs rgyas kun du rab 'grub phyir //
T02D2660:316a-35: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02D2660:316a-36: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2660:316a-37: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba blang par bya'o //
T02D2660:316a-38: rdo rjes rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba yang rdo rje de rang gi mgo la bzhag la /
T02D2660:316a-39: aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02D2660:316a-40: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba 'dis blang bar bya ste /
T02D2660:316a-41: rang gi ming yang gang yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2660:316a-43: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2660:316a-44: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2660:316a-45: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D2660:316a-46: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma
T02D2660:316a-47: ya tishtha ae sha tv'am dha ra y'a mi badzra
T02D2660:316a-48: satva hi hi hi hi h'um ;
T02D2660:316a-49: zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
T02D2660:316a-50: aom badzra satva su sam gra ha da /
T02D2660:316a-54: zhes bya ba de glur blang zhing /
T02D2660:316a-55: re re zhing rdo rje'i gar byas la /
T02D2660:316a-56: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod ba brgyad
T02D2660:316b-0: kyi las kyi phyag rgyas yang dag @316b par mchod
T02D2660:316b-1: de / thag pa g-yon pas dril bu blangs la /
T02D2660:316b-2: g-yas pas rdo rje gsor zhing /
T02D2660:316b-3: rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2660:316b-5: yang rdo rje de rab gi snying gar stod pa'i tshul gyis 'jog cing /
T02D2660:316b-8: yi ge h'um nyid kyis gzung bar byas la /
T02D2660:316b-9: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2660:316b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2660:316b-11: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2660:316b-12: rdo rje snyems bdag bdag po'i bdag / chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2660:316b-13: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D2660:316b-14: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchog ni mdzad pa yin //
T02D2660:316b-15: dharma aa: zhes bya ba ni dril bu'i sa bon no //
T02D2660:316b-16: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D2660:316b-17: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02D2660:316b-18: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2660:316b-19: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02D2660:316b-20: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02D2660:316b-21: ci 'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du //
T02D2660:316b-22: rang gi lha rnams sbyor ba yis //
T02D2660:316b-23: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya'o //
T02D2660:316b-24: de nas dril bu de krol zhing dam tshig gsum
T02D2660:316b-25: gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ba ni 'di yin te
T02D2660:316b-26: / aom nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan nyid phyir //
T02D2660:316b-27: thog ma mtha' ma med pa'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod //
T02D2660:316b-28: kun mchog dngos po chen po ste //
T02D2660:316b-29: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D2660:316b-30: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2660:316b-31: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2660:316b-32: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
T02D2660:316b-33: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags la //
T02D2660:316b-34: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02D2660:316b-35: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02D2660:316b-36: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2660:316b-37: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2660:316b-38: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2660:316b-39: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug
T02D2660:316b-40: chen po phyag rgya'i mchog / grub pa'i rdo rje
T02D2660:316b-41: cher bstod pa // rdo rje snyems pa bdag mdzod
T02D2660:316b-42: cag / de nas rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D2660:316b-45: zhes bya ba 'dis rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i mos pa byas la /
T02D2660:316b-47: zhes bya ba 'dis bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid
T02D2660:316b-48: kyi rang gi lha'i ngo bo nyid du bsams la
T02D2660:317a-1: par gyur pa de srid du thun bzhir rim pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2660:317a-2: bsgom pas skyo na snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2660:317a-3: la kun nas 'khor ba'i tshul du yid kyis bzlas
T02D2660:317a-5: bsam gtan gyis ni gsang sngags bzla //
T02D2660:317a-6: myur ches pa dang bul ches dang //
T02D2660:317a-7: mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang //
T02D2660:317a-8: rnam rtog spangs te bzla bar bya //
T02D2660:317a-9: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ji srid skyo bar ma
T02D2660:317a-10: gyur ba de srid kyi bar du brjod par bya'o
T02D2660:317a-11: // de nas phyag rgya chen po'am sngags gtong 'dod
T02D2660:317a-12: na yi ge brgya pa rdo rje'i tshig gam yid
T02D2660:317a-13: // kyis bzla'o // de nas ye shes sems dpa'
T02D2660:317a-14: yid kyis mdun du bzhugs par bsams la me tog
T02D2660:317a-16: sgeg mo la sogs pas tshul bzhin du mchod la bzod par gsol nas /
T02D2660:317a-17: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D2660:317a-18: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D2660:317a-19: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2660:317a-20: badzra mu: zhes brjod de rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya gyen du bkrol bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2660:317a-21: srung ba byas nas mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2660:317a-22: bdag 'dra rmongs pa gang dag gis //
T02D2660:317a-24: mkhas pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i phyir //
